text: Mieczysław Pietrewicz (1941 - 6 May 2022) was a Polish economist and politician. He was the Minister of State Treasury and Deputy Prime Minister from 1996 until 1997. He was a member of the Sejm from 1997 until 2001. Pietrewicz was a member of Monetary Policy Council from 2004 until 2010. Pietrewicz died on 6 May 2022 at the age of 81.Nie żyje prof. dr hab. Mirosław Pietrewicz, wieloletni wykładowca SGH w Warszawie ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish economists Category:Polish politicians
title: Mieczysław Pietrewicz
